tickets.customer_query: My WiFi router is not connecting to the internet
tickets.resolution: Reset router by pressing reset button for 10 seconds. Reconfigure using default credentials (admin/admin). If issue persists, check if ISP service is active.
tickets.agent_notes: Customer confirmed router lights turned green after reset

tickets.customer_query: I was charged twice for October bill
tickets.resolution: Billing error confirmed. Duplicate charge of ₹599 reversed. Refund will reflect in 3-5 business days. Reference: REF89234
tickets.agent_notes: Escalated to billing team. Customer satisfied with resolution

tickets.customer_query: Internet speed is very slow even after router restart
tickets.resolution: Run speed test at fast.com. Check for 10+ connected devices. Optimize by disconnecting unused devices. Speed should be 80% of plan (80 Mbps for 100 Mbps plan). Scheduled technician visit if below 50%.
tickets.agent_notes: Customer had 15 devices connected. Speed improved after optimization

tickets.customer_query: Forgot my account password and cannot login
tickets.resolution: Password reset via SMS: Text RESET to 54321. Customer will receive link to set new password. Alternative: Visit nearest store with ID proof.
tickets.agent_notes: Customer successfully reset password via SMS

tickets.customer_query: Mobile data not working on my phone
tickets.resolution: Steps: 1) Toggle airplane mode ON/OFF 2) Check APN settings (APN: internet, Username: blank, Password: blank) 3) Restart phone 4) Verify data balance is positive
tickets.agent_notes: APN settings were incorrect. Fixed after configuration

tickets.customer_query: Want to change from 100 Mbps plan to 200 Mbps plan
tickets.resolution: Plan upgrade processed. New plan: 200 Mbps at ₹999/month (previous: ₹699/month). Changes effective from next billing cycle. Pro-rated charges: ₹150 for current month.
tickets.agent_notes: Customer opted for immediate upgrade with pro-rated charges

tickets.customer_query: Getting error message connection timeout on laptop
tickets.resolution: Clear DNS cache: Open CMD > type 'ipconfig /flushdns'. Change DNS to Google DNS (8.8.8.8 and 8.8.4.4). Restart laptop. If persists, check firewall settings.
tickets.agent_notes: DNS cache issue. Resolved after flushing DNS

tickets.customer_query: Received bill but payment already done last week
tickets.resolution: Payment of ₹799 confirmed on 10-Oct-2024. Bill generation was before payment processing. No action needed. Next bill will reflect zero balance.
tickets.agent_notes: System delay in payment reflection. Customer informed

tickets.customer_query: WiFi signal is weak in bedroom
tickets.resolution: Reposition router to central location. Check for interference from microwaves/cordless phones. Consider WiFi extender for large homes (2000+ sq ft). Offer: Mesh WiFi system at ₹2999.
tickets.agent_notes: Customer purchased WiFi extender. Signal strength improved

tickets.customer_query: Want to update mobile number linked to account
tickets.resolution: Mobile update requires verification. OTP sent to existing number (XXXX1234). Enter OTP > Update new number. Visit store if old number not accessible.
tickets.agent_notes: Customer verified via OTP and updated number successfully

tickets.customer_query: Cannot connect to VPN while on home WiFi
tickets.resolution: Allow VPN ports in router: Forward ports 1723 (PPTP) or 500/4500 (IPSec). Check if ISP blocks VPN. Alternative: Use mobile hotspot to verify if issue is router-specific.
tickets.agent_notes: Router firewall was blocking VPN. Port forwarding enabled

tickets.customer_query: Charged for international calls I never made
tickets.resolution: Call detail record checked. Calls to +971 (UAE) on 12-Oct-2024 from device. If unauthorized, file police complaint. SIM will be blocked and new SIM issued. Charges disputed: ₹2340
tickets.agent_notes: Possible SIM cloning. Security team involved

tickets.customer_query: Smart TV cannot find WiFi network
tickets.resolution: Check if 5GHz band enabled. Some TVs only support 2.4GHz. Enable 2.4GHz in router settings. SSID should be visible. Try manual SSID entry if hidden network.
tickets.agent_notes: TV only supported 2.4GHz. Customer enabled band and connected

tickets.customer_query: Need to transfer ownership to my spouse
tickets.resolution: Ownership transfer requires: 1) Both parties' ID proof 2) Visit store together 3) NOC from current owner. Processing time: 2-3 business days. No charges applicable.
tickets.agent_notes: Documents submitted. Transfer completed successfully

tickets.customer_query: Frequent disconnections every 30 minutes
tickets.resolution: Check router logs for errors. Update router firmware to latest version. Check cable connections (loose cables cause drops). If issue persists, replace router under warranty.
tickets.agent_notes: Firmware update resolved disconnection issue

tickets.customer_query: Autopay failed but I have sufficient balance
tickets.resolution: Payment gateway timeout. Manual payment link sent via SMS. Autopay will retry in 24 hours. No late fees for technical failures. Grace period: 7 days.
tickets.agent_notes: Customer paid via link. Autopay setup verified

tickets.customer_query: Cannot send MMS messages
tickets.resolution: Check APN settings: MMS APN should be mms.example.com. Enable mobile data while sending MMS. Verify MMS center number: +919876543210. Restart phone after settings.
tickets.agent_notes: MMS APN was missing. Customer configured and tested successfully

tickets.customer_query: Want to port my number to your network from competitor
tickets.resolution: Port-in process: 1) SMS PORT <10-digit number> to 1900 2) Receive UPC code 3) Visit store with UPC, ID proof, photo 4) Complete in 7 days. Current plan: ₹499/month with 2GB/day
tickets.agent_notes: Port-in request processed. Number activated on Day 7

tickets.customer_query: Email not working on iPhone after settings update
tickets.resolution: Reconfigure email: Delete account > Add account > IMAP settings (mail.example.com, port 993, SSL enabled). Password: account password. Sync: 1 week. Test send/receive.
tickets.agent_notes: Email account re-added. Working normally

tickets.customer_query: Want detailed call records for last 6 months
tickets.resolution: Call detail records (CDR) available for 6 months. Download from customer portal > Billing > Call History. For email delivery: Request takes 2-3 days. Format: PDF/Excel
tickets.agent_notes: Customer accessed portal and downloaded CDR

tickets.customer_query: Router showing red light continuously
tickets.resolution: Red light indicates no internet connection. Check: 1) Cable connected to WAN port 2) ISP service active 3) Router power cycle. If issue persists, schedule technician visit.
tickets.agent_notes: Cable was loose in WAN port. Reconnected and working

tickets.customer_query: Want to close my account and get refund
tickets.resolution: Account closure requires 30-day notice. Unused balance ₹234 will be refunded to bank account in 15-30 days. Return rented equipment (router) to avoid ₹2000 deposit forfeiture.
tickets.agent_notes: Closure request logged. Refund processing after 30 days

tickets.customer_query: Cannot make outgoing calls but can receive
tickets.resolution: Check: 1) Sufficient balance (minimum ₹10 required) 2) Outgoing call barring not enabled 3) IMEI registered 4) Not in roaming without roaming pack. Dial *121# to check balance.
tickets.agent_notes: Balance was ₹3. Customer recharged and issue resolved

tickets.customer_query: Overcharged for data usage beyond my plan
tickets.resolution: Data usage checked: 65GB used (plan: 60GB). Overage charges: ₹50 for 5GB. To avoid: Enable data usage alerts. Upgrade to unlimited plan (₹799/month) or add data booster packs.
tickets.agent_notes: Customer understood overage policy. Opted for data alerts

tickets.customer_query: Laptop connects to WiFi but shows no internet
tickets.resolution: Issue: IP conflict or DNS problem. Solutions: 1) Forget network and reconnect 2) Release/renew IP (ipconfig /release then /renew) 3) Change DNS to 1.1.1.1 and 1.0.0.1 4) Disable IPv6
tickets.agent_notes: IP conflict resolved after release/renew

tickets.customer_query: Want to add international roaming to my plan
tickets.resolution: International roaming packs: 1) Basic - ₹599 for 7 days (1GB data + 100 mins) 2) Premium - ₹2999 for 30 days (10GB data + 500 mins). Activation: Instant. Valid in 150+ countries.
tickets.agent_notes: Customer activated Premium pack for upcoming travel

tickets.customer_query: Getting Too many authentication failures error
tickets.resolution: WiFi password changed recently. Forget network on all devices and reconnect with new password. Clear saved WiFi credentials. Ensure password is typed correctly (case-sensitive).
tickets.agent_notes: Customer had saved old password. Reconnected successfully

tickets.customer_query: Charged for services I did not subscribe to
tickets.resolution: Subscription review: ₹50/month for Caller Tune service (subscribed 3 months ago via SMS). To unsubscribe: Dial *123# > Value Added Services > Deactivate. Refund not applicable for past charges.
tickets.agent_notes: Customer unsubscribed. No fraudulent charges found

tickets.customer_query: 5G not working on my new phone
tickets.resolution: Check: 1) 5G plan active (upgrade from 4G costs ₹100/month) 2) 5G coverage in your area (check coverage map) 3) 5G enabled in phone settings 4) SIM supports 5G (free upgrade available)
tickets.agent_notes: Customer upgraded to 5G plan. Service activated

tickets.customer_query: Lost my phone need to block SIM immediately
tickets.resolution: SIM blocked successfully to prevent misuse. Visit nearest store with ID proof for replacement SIM. Cost: ₹25. Same number retained. Temporary SIM available if urgent.
tickets.agent_notes: SIM blocked within 5 minutes of request. Customer visiting store

tickets.customer_query: YouTube videos buffering constantly
tickets.resolution: Speed test shows 15 Mbps (plan: 50 Mbps). Possible causes: 1) Network congestion (peak hours 8-11 PM) 2) ISP throttling 3) Old router. Solutions: Upgrade router, change DNS, schedule off-peak downloads.
tickets.agent_notes: Router was 5 years old. Upgrade improved speeds to 45 Mbps

tickets.customer_query: Want GST invoice for company reimbursement
tickets.resolution: GST invoice available in customer portal > Billing > Download Invoice. Company name and GSTIN must be updated in profile. Changes reflect from next bill. Manual invoice: 3-5 days via email.
tickets.agent_notes: Customer downloaded GST invoice from portal

tickets.customer_query: Cannot access certain websites showing ERR_CONNECTION_REFUSED
tickets.resolution: Websites may be blocked by ISP or government order. Use VPN or change DNS to Cloudflare (1.1.1.1). Clear browser cache. Check if website is down (use downforeveryoneorjustme.com).
tickets.agent_notes: DNS change resolved access issues

tickets.customer_query: Want to merge two accounts under same name
tickets.resolution: Account merger requires: Both accounts in same name, visit store with both SIM cards and ID proof. Combined billing, shared data possible. Processing: 5-7 days. No charges.
tickets.agent_notes: Documents submitted. Merger in progress

tickets.customer_query: Phone showing Emergency calls only
tickets.resolution: Possible causes: 1) Network issue in area 2) SIM not properly inserted 3) Phone locked to different carrier 4) Unpaid bills. Solutions: Reinsert SIM, restart phone, check payment status.
tickets.agent_notes: Unpaid bill of ₹799. Customer paid and service restored in 2 hours

tickets.customer_query: Previous month bill amount higher than usual
tickets.resolution: Bill analysis: Regular charges ₹699 + One-time router installation ₹500 + Security deposit ₹1000 (refundable). Total: ₹2199. Next month will be regular ₹699. Deposit refunded upon account closure.
tickets.agent_notes: Customer understood one-time charges breakdown

tickets.customer_query: WiFi keeps asking for password even after entering correct one
tickets.resolution: Router issue. Solutions: 1) Change WiFi password to simple one (no special characters) 2) Change security to WPA2-PSK 3) Update router firmware 4) Factory reset router as last resort.
tickets.agent_notes: Customer changed security protocol. Issue resolved

tickets.customer_query: Want to gift data to my friend same network
tickets.resolution: Data gifting: Dial *567*friend_number*data_amount# Example: *567*9876543210*5# gifts 5GB. Daily limit: 10GB. Both numbers must be on same operator. Validity same as recipient's main pack.
tickets.agent_notes: Customer successfully gifted 3GB to friend

tickets.customer_query: Calls dropping frequently in specific area
tickets.resolution: Coverage issue reported in your area (Jubilee Hills). Network team investigating. Expected resolution: 5-7 days. Temporary solution: Enable WiFi calling or use different location. Complaint ID: NW8923.
tickets.agent_notes: Escalated to network operations team

tickets.customer_query: Want to change payment date from 1st to 15th of month
tickets.resolution: Billing cycle change possible. New cycle: 15th of every month. Pro-rated charges for transition: ₹350 for partial period. Changes effective from next cycle. Confirmation SMS sent.
tickets.agent_notes: Billing cycle updated successfully

tickets.customer_query: Cannot login to customer portal forgot credentials
tickets.resolution: Username recovery: Enter registered mobile number, receive SMS with username. Password reset: Click Forgot Password, OTP sent to mobile. After 3 failed attempts, account locked for 24 hours.
tickets.agent_notes: Customer recovered username and reset password

tickets.customer_query: Moving to different city want to change service address
tickets.resolution: Address change: Login to portal > Profile > Update Address. Proof required (Aadhar/Rental agreement). Technician visit for router relocation: ₹300. Service continuity maintained.
tickets.agent_notes: Relocation completed. Services active at new address

tickets.customer_query: Smart home devices not connecting to WiFi
tickets.resolution: IoT devices need 2.4GHz network. Many support only WPA2 (not WPA3). Create separate SSID for smart devices. Disable AP isolation in router. Check device compatibility list.
tickets.agent_notes: Customer created 2.4GHz network. All devices connected

tickets.customer_query: Disputing charges for premium content subscription
tickets.resolution: Premium sports pack ₹299/month subscribed on 15-Oct via app. Subscription is voluntary, no automatic enrollment. To cancel: App > Subscriptions > Cancel. No refund for current month.
tickets.agent_notes: Customer cancelled subscription. Provided cancellation confirmation

tickets.customer_query: Video calls have poor quality and lag
tickets.resolution: Video call quality depends on upload speed. Check upload: minimum 3 Mbps needed. Close background apps using internet. Use WiFi instead of mobile data. Disable HD video if bandwidth low.
tickets.agent_notes: Customer had 1.5 Mbps upload. Advised to upgrade plan

tickets.customer_query: Want senior citizen discount on plan
tickets.resolution: Senior citizen discount: 10% off on plans ₹499 and above. Age proof required (Aadhar/Passport showing 60+ years). Apply online or visit store. Discount from next billing cycle.
tickets.agent_notes: Customer eligible. Discount applied from next month

tickets.customer_query: Receiving spam calls despite DND registration
tickets.resolution: DND active on your number. Report spam: Forward spam SMS to 1909 or use mobile app to report caller. Takes 7 days to fully activate. Block numbers in phone settings for immediate relief.
tickets.agent_notes: Customer reported 5 spam numbers. Advised to use Truecaller

tickets.customer_query: Auto-renewal of plan failed need manual recharge
tickets.resolution: Auto-renewal failed due to payment gateway issue. Manual recharge options: 1) Customer portal 2) Mobile app 3) Nearest store 4) Authorized retailers. Grace period: 3 days before disconnection.
tickets.agent_notes: Customer recharged via app. Auto-renewal fixed

tickets.customer_query: Cannot access office VPN from home connection
tickets.resolution: Some corporate VPNs require static IP. Check with IT team if static IP needed (costs ₹500/month extra). Ensure router not blocking VPN protocols. Try different VPN server locations.
tickets.agent_notes: Customer subscribed to static IP addon
